Question: On 1 January 2007, Glass House Mountains Road, the road that runs by the Australia Zoo, was officially renamed this person Way.
Hints: This person's death is believed to be the only fatality from a stingray ever captured on video.
A Pacific National NR class locomotive was named this person as part of the campaign.
In 2006, this person provided his voice for the 2006 animated film Happy Feet, as an elephant seal named Trev.
